CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1957, pg.1, reads: "HONORARY PALLBEARERS - A lifelong friend, prothonotary David B. Roberts, led the way for six other honorary pallbearers after funeral services were completed for Detective John B. Thompson at Christian Tabernacle Church Monday. On the right is Charles Elmer Gray who served as usher and assisted the flower girls.  - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Charles Elmer Gray wearing dark suit holding large floral arrangement with birds and ribbon, and Prothonotary David B. Roberts on left, walking in front of group along exterior of Christian Tabernacle Church, for funeral of Detective John B. Thompson, Centre Avenue, Hill District
